Зашибись игра. По истории даже лучше первого биошока. Оружия только сильно много (не люблю сильно большой выбор. не успеваю нормально пострелять из одной пушки, а уже подсовывают новую. и ее тоже надо прокачивать). Энергетиков тоже многовато, треть дают открыть только почти в конце игры, не давая нормальной возможности их прокачать и наиграться ими...
Sehr geil

Un fantastique jeu, et je n'en ai pas encore vu tout! Les graphismes et l'ambiance sont enchanteurs (mm si de très près, c'est parfois grossier). Le doublage est excellent, la personnalité du perso principale est attractive. La mécanique du jeu s'apprend vite, on retrouve avec plaisir les "pouvoirs" des premiers bioshocks, toujours drôles à utiliser. L'histoire est intéressante et distillée lentement: on a envi d'en savoir plus sur la cité, sur ce qu'est réellement la fille qu'on doit libérer, ce que cherche à accomplir le prophète... Avec une 7750, le framerate est très bon lui aussi, ce jeu convient donc pour des machines plus modestes.
from this day on, every time i get a nosebleed, i will say booker, your nose is bleeding.

Bioshock Infinite is quite a good game. First of all, the graphics. Visually it is a master piece, as the excellent colors and animations allow it to put recent titles to shame. The story is amazing, although even if you have an IQ of over 9000, you will still probably have difficulty understanding the ending. The 3 main characters are masterfully voice acted and constructed with precision rarely seen in modern gaming. All of them are developed extremely well as the story progresses. The female protagonist, Elizabeth, is without a doubt the best companion of all time. Her personality is amazing, she is very useful, and you do not have to protect her. (thank god!!!) While all these features are excellent, i would not go as far as to call it one of the best games ever, as some people have done. This is mainly because the gameplay is nothing out of ordinary and, from what I have heard, very similar to Bioshock's. In addtion the game is only about 14 hours, which is a little short. All in all, definately pick it up for like 7$ when it goes on sale, as I do not recommend buying it for 30$ simply because it is short. In addition you should not have any difficulty running it as it does have excellent optimization. 

8/10 is gud gaim ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) would get mind ****** again.

I'd recommend also getting the Season Pass. Primarly when its on sale of course. It adds on to the main story of the game believe it or not. This game is awesome as a whole. This perhaps is my favorite BioShock for many different reasons. The story is a typical BioShock story which means its GREAT!

this game....
Mind=blown

Это игра, которая после своего прохождения не всякого оставит ровно дышать по отношению к миру в который она тебя погружает с головой, сюжету изначально немного запутанному, но тем не менее постепенно раскрывающему тебе все свои тайны. Хочется посетить и увидеть каждый уголок этого «замечательного» города, этой вселенной, которую так трепетно создавали разработчики. Отдельно хочется выделить ключевых персонажей игры, это не просто кучка заскриптованных пикселей, они внушают тебе такое ощущение, будто они живые, и у них свой характер, своя точка зрения на происходящие ситуации. Игра безусловно стоит своих денег, даже сейчас, спустя столько времени после её выхода, приятно смотреть на эту картинку, которая всякий раз при запуске, радует глаз.
Безусловно это шедевр.

Когда у меня не было мощного компьютера, мимо меня прошли многие игры. Спустя года я решил наверстать упущенное и добрался в итоге до Bioshock тогда еще первого. Не зацепило. Второй. Не зацепило. Купив трипл пак на распродаже из жадности ( :) ) положил на полку до лучших времен. На днях от скуки поставил третий, просто посмотреть. 10 из 10. Я не думал что игры НАСТОЛЬКО могут держать сюжетом. Как сказал один мой друг и я его поддержу в этом - шутер, где сюжет интереснее самого шутера. Не оторваться, просто не оторваться, на одном дыхании. Честно да, к середине игры надоедает однообразие процесса, но ты идешь потому что хочешь знать что же тут не так. Это шедевр.

I love the story of the game and i love Elisabeth. Often AI compagnions are very annoying, but not this one. This character is done great on so many levels. It is just a pleasure, to see how she is interacting with you and the sourrounding. It almost feels like she is played by a friend. And everytime you get seperated in the game, you really miss her. Well done!

Se me cayó un poco del pedestal, sigue siendo un muy buen juego aunque se separe brutalmente de sus predecesores. Tiene una ambientación totalmente antitética y te aparte del mundo ateo sin moral donde todo el mundo es libre de hacer lo que es capaz de hacer, a un lugar adoctrinado en el más profundo ámbito de un dogma religioso impartido por un mesías que tiene más oscuridad que luz. Se cambian la interfaz para estar acorde con el nuevo escenario y un ligero cambio sobre el mecanismo de poderes y armas. En cuanto a la historia... tuve que verme el final dos veces para poder entender qué cojones estaba pasando.

Here is a great game. 
Good story ( Even though its hard to grasp at first) and Beautiful visuals. I can't stress that enough. 

I hope the first sentence is enough to get you guys to buy the game. 

Anyways, 

Pros
*Good story and character development. 
*Gorgeous visuals and vibrant colors. 
*A game world which is alive. 
*Elizabeth is not another "Damesel in distress" and is very helpful and supportive (And does not block your path like   Lydia in Skyrim :3) 
*Fucking sky hook. 

Cons
*Enemy Ai spots you instantly (Even with the gear sometimes) and makes sneaking pointless. 
*It lacks a manual save system. 
*Melee combat feels a little dull.
*Game feels a bit linear.

And the biggest problem is that you have to purchase the DLC to experience the whole story. Mind you I am not saying that the game is a half cooked meal or anything like that. But because the DLC ties in with the original bioshock.   

Thats all I have to say. 

GLHF :)
Pure genius!!

The plot twists from Bioshock only continue to deliver. Unfortunately, about eighty percent of the story comes in the last 20 minutes of the game, and to get to it, you have to fight your way through seemingly never ending hordes of the same 4 or 5 repeating enemies. Some of my favorite aspects of the series are altered in ways that completely change the way the game is played, like ammo and eve conservation (Elizabeth constantly throws you ammo and salts) and plasmids have been completely cut down to mere circus acts. I can no longer hack my way through everything and having locked doors are basically useless because Elizabeth just opens them all. I'll admit my jaw dropped when I found myself back in Rapture, but honestly visiting for 5 minutes really added no actual content to the story line. Overall, I'd absolutely recommend this game to anyone who enjoys a FPS and a good plot line, but for all you who fell in love with rapture like I did, don’t expect the same type of experience.

This is definately one of the best games I have ever played. This has non-stop action and a story that captures your imagination. The graphics are nothing short from breathtaking.

The mayor surprise for me was the ending... oh boy was that unexpected! I'm sure I'll replay this game every few years to re-live the amazing journey.

Unfortunately, I did not find the game itself to be compelling or interesting, and moved on to other titles after a few hours of gameplay. Perhaps I will give it another chance someday, if VP ever gets surround working in EON.

Вы когда-нибудь пробовали писать диссертацию после великолепного путешествия по экзотической стране? Примерно такая же задача стоит перед любым обозревателем BioShock Infinite . Чувство блаженной счастливой усталости переполняет тебя после прохождения, хочется спокойно возродить в памяти лучшие моменты прошедшего дня или повторить празднование. Ведь именно таково творение Irrational Games . BioShock Infinite — геймерский праздник, вызывающий буйство эмоций и мыслей....

Достоинства: потрясающий дизайн; захватывающая атмосфера; интересный сюжет; продуманные образы персонажей; динамичные перестрелки; прекрасная Элизабет.

Недостатки: вам не стыдно сюда смотреть?
Рекомендую игру. Очень динамичные бои между солдатыми. Но при этом старый Biochock, новые и старые энергетики, куча оружия, все те же автоматы.

Most Fun FPS Gameplay ever meets Most Complicated Story ever.

The two of them make infinite love at 2K Studios... and give birth to...

Bioshock... Infinite. Infinite because you litterally infinitely travel back and forth to other dimensions... and because the two of them are still making love.

BUY IT NOW! THINK WHY LATER! 

End of the story.

While it brings some new ideas to the table, it takes away/waters down too many of the game mechanics that defined the series.

Everyone loved Bioshock because it had so much emphasis on item management/survival against nigh-unstoppable foes. 

But in this game, they gave you a follower that will pull you away from what you're doing and toss you some ammo or a health kit. ...Yay? Good thing I don't have to explore the 'vast open world' to find items, because it's got less open world than Half Life 2.

This game also likes to throw an army of cannon fodder at you practically the entire game. Handymen don't hold a candle to Big Daddies and wind-up Patriots are just Rosies whose only exist so you can turn them onto enemies instead. 
Every splicer is a one time miniboss. They never reoccur. Don't worry about the giant pidgeon- it might as well be a part of the scenery.

---

[b]TL;DR:[/b] If you hated anything about Bioshock 1 & 2, this is the game for you!
Never really got into the other Bioshock games, but the combination of beautiful scenery, fluid mechanics, and an amazing story kept me hooked until the very end

Лаборатория Сушонга, его клиника, лифт в банке Комстока - всё это напоминает атмосферу System Shock (не говоря о явных отсылок вроде того, как подзагружаются уровни, кровь на стенах). А баскетбол в в первом дополнении! Тут тоже Левин передаёт привет самому себе молодому. Жалко никто моих скриншотов не будет смотреть - хотя желание делать их отвлекало от замечательной режиссуры игры. В конце хотелось не играть, а высасывать из компа эту историю. В конце почувствовал, что "Биошок" - это не просто моделька мира, а реальный мир, который будет во мне жить. Жалко, что он кончился, пойду что ли в суперолдфаги и поиграю в System Shock 1, пока 3-й не вышел.

Now that I've finished the entirety of the Bioshock series, all I can do is cross my fingers and hope that 2K decides to go through with Bioshock 4. If you're considering getting this game- just get the whole Bioshock series; an absolutely beautiful bunch of games.

You must buy this game. There is no question about that. This game is just so amazing. This is probally the BEST out of the Bioshock series. The story is so amazing with a twist around every corner and an ending that will give you a nose bleed if you even try to comprehend it. The weapon varity might be a little bit limited, but it is still there and with very creative guns of the lot that exist. The shooting is the best out of the three games with the tight controls. You now have a shelid that will deplete as you take hits and an amazing cover system to put the cherry on top. The infamous plasmids are back and better than ever with all new delicious flavours such as "Devils Kiss", "Bucking Bronco", and my personal favourite: "Muder by Crows". The also introduce two new systems: the Sky-hook and the ablity to control space and time in the later hours of the game. The hook is very fun to zip along with and provides us with some very gory mele kills. The albilty to control space and time is a little limted and is only there for a little part of the game, but it is still very helpful for finding cover and finding ammo. 

 "What did you ask 'what' when the delicious question is why didn't you buy this game already?"
no lo he terminado pero con lo que he jugado puedo valorar todos los detalles que tiene y lo cuidado que esta lo recomiendo muchisimo.
Este juego.. joder me acuerdo la sensacion d ecuando era niño y jugaba, este juego ha conseguido recordarmelo

O jogo foca na história, na riqueza do cenário e no realismo do shooting. É incrível, a imersão é completa e com bons headphones você realmente entra em columbia. Fora que a Elizabeth é gatíssima ne? hahah =)  quem gosta de steampunk não pode ficar sem jogar

The most overrated game i have ever played. The game is one of the most beautiful game i have played visually. What about the sound? Non stop obnoxious banging, explosions and yelling from start to finish. I swear the composer of the battle music is more a danger to my health than the enemies. Extremely basic spammy FPS waves that disorientate you as the "music" and yelling assaults your ears. The gameplay actually reminds me alot of infamously bad "Goldeneye rogue agent". Towards the 3/4 mark, the enemies become bullet sponges. One of the smaller flak launching enemies took FIVE RPG rockets on EASY mode, which is the mode i played it on because i quickly realised i wanted to be done with it as soon as possible. The much praised "innovations" were the skylines and the vigors. The skylines served only to confuse me as i attempted to rush through the game. The vigors are almost exclusively identical flashy reskins of "grenade" and "mine". Finally the much praised story didn't do much for me considering that very early on in the game, in a flashback, I saw that the protagonist drinks absinthe. So all of the wonder and mystery about this world was *gone* when i realised "oh, this guy is a drunk who is out of his mind laying in a ditch somewhere" because he drinks bloody absinthe. None of it is real. It's like finding out at the end of the game that the character was *dreaming* except i found out he's a hallucinating drunkard within the first quarter hour of the game.

я начинаю обзор обрати к монитору внимательней свой взор, небось слыхали вы об агентстве "Пинтеркона" главный герой наш именно от туда родом с законам правда теперь он уже не связан, алкоголь долги образ жизни отвязанный, действие игры происходят в 20-веке когда летающий город построили в Америки, все довольны и гордятся новым чудом света, "Колумбией" назвали, город плавает по ветру, вся проблема в том что Пророк начал качать права, все слушают его, и если надо умрут за него, пропала ,,Колуммбия" за облаками где и как ее искать не кто не знает, что она замышляет не кто не в курсе, власти в панике ведь не кто не поможет и в это заварухе наш герой вступает в игру, те кому он должен бабок решат его судьбу, надо ему в тот город попасть и одну девушку сыскать, потом ее отдать, что за девушка, зачем? и в ней ли разгадка, а сможет она помочь, вернуть все обратно, и дать на все ответы, ты узнаешь когда пройдешь эту игру, ребят прошу к сюжету отнестись серьёзно, это не та игра где тупо пострелять можно, сложно всё запутанно но если понять суть, раздумья не дадут вам уснуть

Shooterparts manchmal zu schwer, ich empfehle den leichtesten Schwierigkeitgrad aus dem einfachen Grund damit man die Story genießen kann. Denn die Story ist der ganz große Trumph dieses Spiels. Highly recommended. It's not your typical Bioshock game. It has its limitations. The story is well thought out and told brilliantly so if you're looking for one of those games that has just about everything and is easy to understand then by all means, buy Bioshock Infinite. In previous Bioshock games you were allowed more than two weapons at a time. This is a design I wish they had kept given the different types of enemies and environments. Splicing is back but in a form of vigors, plenty to choose from but again, it seems lacking considering you aquire the majority of your vigors 3/4 through the game. Graphics are amazing. The visuals are quite pleasing, from sunny skies to war torn backgrounds you'll definitely feel immersed in the world of Columbia. 

Pros: Story, visuals, gun play, characters.

Cons: Can only carry two guns, character customizations are quite limited compared to previous Bioshock titles.

Excelente juego, vale la pena en especial en oferta!

Infinite is more than a new setting, story, and characters; those elements are seamlessly integrated with complex themes, a mysterious plot, and entertaining combat to create an amazing experience from beginning to end. Familiar threads run through it – a lighthouse, a strange city, a charismatic antagonist – but they are homages to the past rather than attempts to recycle it. The core of Infinite is unlike anything else on land, sea, or air.

Damn I love bioshock infinite. I love the artwork, the colors, the scenery, the atmosphere, and the story. I felt as if I was actually in the world of bioshock. Lovely game, lovely song!﻿

Once I saw the ending, I just sat at my desk for 10 minutes with a blank face. For the first time in my life I could say that I had no emotion, no thought, no feeling. My mind was penetrated on too many levels.

The ending of this game broke me..

两周目通关了来写个评测，接下来打算继续尝试dlc。购买这款游戏是在一年前左右，当时玩通关了就感触颇深，不过并没有继续去深入玩。此前本人并没有对生化奇兵系列有过多的了解，通关这一部后才去玩了这个系列另外几部作品。首先从个人角度来说，我更加喜欢第三部的风格。生化奇兵系列共有的特点都是略带压抑和阴暗的气氛。然而在这部一开始，初到哥伦比亚，温暖的阳光，耳边环绕的轻柔慵懒的女声歌曲，使本人直接爱上了这种感觉。 游戏剧情虽然是线性但是引人入胜，使人想不断地和伊丽莎白一起冒险，揭开真相。虽然在通关过程中可能对剧情有点摸不着头脑，但是大结局后多少有点恍然大悟的感觉。总体来说是非常值得入手的游戏。本人文采不好，也写不了多少，在这里仅仅是希望能够有更多人体验到这款游戏，收获一份属于自己的对合格游戏的理解，欣赏，和感动。



评分10/10

One of the best games i have ever played

Disregard the hours I spent on it. I finished the game on a friend's account before I bought it on mine, thinking I'll want to play it again.

 While this is game is an achievement in terms of graphics and storyline, the gameplay doesn't change much throughout the game. Sure the combat is cool and exciting, but the fact that it's mostly swarming enemies trying to shoot you doesn't require you to think strategically. If you shoot them enough they will all die. This makes the game not very replayable, which means that when you finish it the first time, there is no desire to play it again. Recommended though.

Игра невероятно красочная. Восхитительная графика, классный геймплей, головокружительный глубокий сюжет. Любопытство Элизабет, её мимика, её красота, заставляют постоянно за ней наблюдать, делать новые прекрасные скриншоты. Игра стоит того, чтобы её обязательно пройти. Шедевр. 10 няшек из 10.

一个非常精彩的冒险故事，剧情跌宕起伏让人深思。
伊丽莎白的陪伴是让玩家一直玩下去的动力，女主角塑造的非常成功。
海葬结局让人有些伤感

One of my favorites! Bioshock infinite has amazing graphics, a good(and complicated) story and great gameplay! Superpowers, Guns, Explosions and Girls. What else do you need. Instead of reading this, go ahead and buy it. You wont regret it!
Gran juego, unahistoria muy interesante, buenajugabilidad y muy entretenido, recomendado al 100

Meiner Meinung nach ein extrem gut gelungenes Spiel, welches, gerade für einen Shooter, eine fesselnde Storyline bietet. 
Jedoch gibt es viele kleine Punkte die zu bemängeln sind, und ehrlich gesagt auch nicht wirklich nötig gewesen wären.
Zum einem gäbe es da das Waffensystem, jetzt mal ernsthaft, in den vorherigen Teilen wurde einem das gesamte Waffenarnsenal des Spiels bereitgestellt, nun muss man überlegen welche Waffen es wert sind mitgenommen zu werden, da die Anzahl der Tragbaren auf 2 beschränkt wurde. 
An den Toniken, oder Plasmiden, gibt es nichts auszusetzen, sie ähneln stark den Vorgängern auch wenn sie jetzt neue Namen tragen; anstatt "Blitzplasmid" eben "Shock Jockey". 
Dann die Story an sich, was ja das Spiel ausmacht (meiner Meinung nach!). Zuerst war ich mit dem Ende von Bioshock Infinite 0 zufrieden... bis die DLC's kamen. 
Die DLC's waren wirklich die Rettung für eine absolut gelungene Spielereihe, denn erst mit dem zweiten "Burial at the Sea- Episode 2" wurden die Vorgänger wieder aufgegriffen und machten die gesamte Geschichte rund.
Somit lohnt sich dann doch jede Stunde, die in der Welt von Bioshock verbracht wird, oder verbracht wurde. Ein gelungenes Game, dem ein bisschen nachweine, dass es doch schon vorbei ist. :)
나에게 처음으로 멋진 배경과 반전엔딩이 무엇인지 알게해준 게임

For sure the best story of any game I have ever played, the gameplay is good enough to keep the story moving along and the environment is gorgeous. 

Everyone should experience this story.
